attributes.action: Make Sure Snug Keeps His Quiff!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Well What can we say about snugs quiff???for years and years it has given pleasure to many people and touched us all. I sadly inform you that Snug is thinking off cutting it off this would be an outrage if he was to deny people the pleasure of his quiff so please sign the petition and we will get them 2 make it illegal 2 cut his quiff off!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
